dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2975 IH: Eliminating Needless Administrative Barriers Lessening Efficiency for Conservation Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Schrier (for herself and Mr. Newhouse) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 with respect to the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eliminating Needless Administrative Barriers Lessening Efficiency for Conservation Act of 2023 or the ENABLE Conservation Act of 2023.

section.header: Amendments to the Food Security Act of 1985

subsection.header: State acres for wildlife enhancement continuous enrollment
subsection.text: Section 1231(d)(6)(A)(i) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3831(d)(6)(A)(i)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subclause (II), by striking and at the end; and
by adding at the end the following:

subclause.text: land that will be enrolled under the State acres for wildlife enhancement initiative established by the Secretary; and

subsection.text: Section 1244(f)(3) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3844(f)(3)) is amended by striking section 1231A and inserting section 1231(d)(6).
